ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ [By the sky] وَٱلطَّارِقِ [and the night comer]
وَمَآ [And what] أَدْرَىٰكَ [can make you know] مَا [what] ٱلطَّارِقُ [the night comer (is)]
ٱلنَّجْمُ [(It is) the star] ٱلثَّاقِبُ [the piercing]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِن [Not] كُلُّ [(is) every] نَفْسٍۢ [soul] لَّمَّا [but] عَلَيْهَا [over it] حَافِظٌۭ [(is) a protector]
ayahs.transliteration: In kullu nafsin lamma AAalayha hafith

ayahs.wordByWord: فَلْيَنظُرِ [So let see] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ [man] مِمَّ [from what] خُلِقَ [he is created]
خُلِقَ [He is created] مِن [from] مَّآءٍۢ [a water] دَافِقٍۢ [ejected]
يَخْرُجُ [Coming forth] مِنۢ [from] بَيْنِ [between] ٱلصُّلْبِ [the backbone] وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ [and the ribs]
إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] عَلَىٰ [to] رَجْعِهِۦ [return him] لَقَادِرٌۭ [(is) Able]
يَوْمَ [(The) Day] تُبْلَى [will be tested] ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ [the secrets]

ayahs.textUthmani: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَمَا [Then not] لَهُۥ [(is) for him] مِن [any] قُوَّةٍۢ [power] وَلَا [and not] نَاصِرٍۢ [any helper]
ayahs.transliteration: Fama lahu min quwwatin wala nasir

ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ [By the sky] ذَاتِ [which] ٱلرَّجْعِ [returns]
وَٱلْأَرْضِ [And the earth] ذَاتِ [which] ٱلصَّدْعِ [cracks open]
إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, it] لَقَوْلٌۭ [(is) surely a Word] فَصْلٌۭ [decisive]
وَمَا [And not] هُوَ [it] بِٱلْهَزْلِ [(is) for amusement]
إِنَّهُمْ [Indeed, they] يَكِيدُونَ [are plotting] كَيْدًۭا [a plot]
وَأَكِيدُ [But I am planning] كَيْدًۭا [a plan]
فَمَهِّلِ [So give respite] ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ [(to) the disbelievers] أَمْهِلْهُمْ [Give respite to them ] رُوَيْدًۢا [little]
سَبِّحِ [Glorify] ٱسْمَ [(the) name] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] ٱلْأَعْلَى [the Most High]
ٱلَّذِى [The One Who] خَلَقَ [created] فَسَوَّىٰ [then proportioned]
وَٱلَّذِى [And the One Who] قَدَّرَ [measured] فَهَدَىٰ [then guided]
وَٱلَّذِىٓ [And the One Who] أَخْرَجَ [brings forth] ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ [the pasture]
فَجَعَلَهُۥ [And then makes it] غُثَآءً [stubble] أَحْوَىٰ [dark]
سَنُقْرِئُكَ [We will make you recite] فَلَا [so not] تَنسَىٰٓ [you will forget]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] مَا [what] شَآءَ [wills] ٱللَّهُ ۚ [Allah] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] يَعْلَمُ [knows] ٱلْجَهْرَ [the manifest] وَمَا [and what] يَخْفَىٰ [is hidden]
ayahs.transliteration: Illa ma shaa Allahuinnahu yaAAlamu aljahra wama yakhfa

ayahs.wordByWord: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ [And We will ease you] لِلْيُسْرَىٰ [to the ease]
فَذَكِّرْ [So remind] إِن [if] نَّفَعَتِ [benefits] ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ [the reminder]
سَيَذَّكَّرُ [He will pay heed ] مَن [(one) who] يَخْشَىٰ [fears (Allah)]
وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا [And will avoid it] ٱلْأَشْقَى [the wretched one]
ٱلَّذِى [The one who] يَصْلَى [will burn] ٱلنَّارَ [(in) the Fire] ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ [[the] great]

ayahs.textUthmani: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
ayahs.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] لَا [not] يَمُوتُ [he will die] فِيهَا [therein] وَلَا [and not] يَحْيَىٰ [will live]
قَدْ [Certainly] أَفْلَحَ [has succeeded] مَن [(one) who] تَزَكَّىٰ [purifies (himself)]
وَذَكَرَ [And remembers] ٱسْمَ [(the) name] رَبِّهِۦ [(of) his Lord] فَصَلَّىٰ [and prays]
